titles.title: A resolution honoring and thanking Terrance W. Gainer, former Chief of the United States Capitol Police.
A resolution honoring and thanking Terrance W. Gainer, former Chief of the United States Capitol Police.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that the Senate honors and thanks Terrance W. Gainer (former Chief of the U.S. Capitol Police), his wife Irene, and his entire family, for a professional commitment of service to the U.S. Capitol Police and Congress.
